record.id: field.name="default.ola" and file.name="slacontrol" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: default.ola
record.file.name: slacontrol

brief.brief: The default Operational Level Agreement to assign automatically on opening a record, if the assignment has not manually underpined OLA,the OLA selection process does not find an OLA.

detail.detail: The OLA for assignment could be viewed in assignment table, meanwhile Operation Level Agreement would store assignment data in from the contacts table, the operator table, or data from both tables.
